content: this lacy shawl will be a versatile addition to your wardrobe because it s lightweight and elegant ombre cotton yarn provides beautiful color changes and the repeatable openwork pattern is easy to memorize use it as a beach cover or add it to a fancy evening dress it s all up to you magnolia lace shawl was first published in your crochet magazine 1 you can read more about it on crochetpedia com 2 instructions include a written pattern and charts this pattern uses basic crochet stitches front loop and back loop as well as post stitches and crab stitch it s suitable for intermediate crocheters and ambitious beginners **buy printable pdf in yourcrochet shop 3 ** measurements after blocking width ~ 140 cm / 55 inches length ~ 69 cm / 27 inches happy crocheting 1 https //shop yourcrochet com/product/your-crochet-magazine-summer-2022/ 2 https //crochetpedia com/magnolia-lace-shawl-crochet-pattern/ 3 https //shop yourcrochet com/product/magnolia-lace-shawl-pdf-crochet-pattern/
